CustomField.formula: IF( OR(AND(CONTAINS(APT_Value_1__c , '1'),CONTAINS( APT_Proposal_Line_Item__r.APT_Price_Structure__c , 'Z30')),AND(CONTAINS(APT_Value_1__c , '0'),CONTAINS( APT_Proposal_Line_Item__r.APT_Price_Structure__c , 'Z40'))),'',IF(OR(CONTAINS(APT_Value_2__c , 'Norfolk Is'),CONTAINS(APT_Value_2__c , 'Christmas & Cocos Is'),CONTAINS(APT_Value_2__c , 'Aust Antarctic Territory')),APT_Value_2__c+"*", APT_Value_2__c ) )
CustomField.label: Value 2 without Code 1
